pr_title: [Communication] - Common - Adding TokenRefreshOptions to CommunicationTokenCredential ctor

timeline.bodyText:
I think we should rename initialToken to simply token everywhere.
For the constructor with refresh options, token can be an optional argument in the options bag, we don't need it as a top-level arg in the constructor.
timeline.author: DominikMe
